description:
In eTribe - People Who Buy From You Again & Again I will provide you a step by step plan on building a group of people who trusts your message so much, they share it with others.

That breaks down into four areas that you are going to learn throughout this entire course.

  1. Passion,
  2. Targeting,
  3. Engaging in presell
  4. Selling.

This works, build your tribe from not only a point of passion but from a point of ethics and a point of helping people.
title: eTribe - People who buy from you again and again
